column1: of Persons Under 15, 18, 21, and 25 Years of Age, 2007
Sex offenses (except forcible rape and prostitution)
Offenses against the family and children

1 Suburban area includes law enforcement agencies in cities with less than 50,000 inhabitants and county law enforcement agencies that are within a Metropolitan Statistical Area.  Suburban area excludes all metropolitan agencies associated with a principal city.

2 Violent crimes are offenses of murder and nonnegligent manslaughter, forcible rape, robbery, and aggravated assault.  Property crimes are offenses of burglary, larceny-theft, motor vehicle theft, and arson.
